p: Tocols of the six P. harmala oils were presented in Table 1 and supplementary materials. The HPLC analyses showed that Peganum oils were rich on tocols. They contained four tocopherol isomers—α-, β-, γ- and δ-tocopherol (abbreviated α-T, β-T, γ-T, and δ-T, respectively)—as well as three tocotrienol isomers: α-, γ- and δ-tocotrienol (α-T3, γ-T3 and δ-T3, respectively).
